Magic
Spell Slots: S0: 6; S1: 4; S2: 3; S3: 3; S4: 3; S5: 3; S6: 2; S7: 2; S8: 1; S9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: S: 4; W: 7 Spell DC: S: 12; W: 15
Spells:
Arcane Gate (S6 Conj): R10' Creates a portal pair that can teleport creatures 500' for conc up to 10 min
Chill Touch (S0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Creation (S5 Illu): R30' Creates a 5' cube of false matter lasting up to 1 dy [+Level creates +5' cube of matter]
Death Ward (S4 [Runechild] Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Detect Magic (S1 Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Magic (S3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Enhance Ability (S2 Tran): Touched gains Adv on chosen ability checks for conc up to 1 hr; Constitution also gives 2d6 temporary HP, Strength dbl load, and Dexterity negates damage from a 20' fall [+Level affects +1 target]
Etherealness (S7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr [+Level affects +2/+5 targets at level 8/9]
Freedom Of Movement (S4 [Runechild] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments for 1 hr
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Gate (S9 Conj): R60' Opens a circular portal to another plane for conc up to 1 min; may be used to bring a creature from target plane
Glyph Of Warding (S3 [Runechild] Abju): 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (Dexterity half) or spell up to level 3 when triggered [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP or triggers +1 spell level]
Greater Restoration (S5 [Runechild] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, or cursed or regains ability or HP maximum
Ice Storm (S4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Insect Plague (S5 Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (Constitution half) for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Lesser Restoration (S2 [Runechild] Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Longstrider (S1 [Runechild] Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr (target donning armor ends)
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Magic Circle (S3 [Runechild] Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents choice of entry or exit (Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts Disadv on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by choice of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Magic Missile (S1 Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Major Image (S3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for conc up to 10 min [+Level extends duration to permanent at level 6]
Message (W0 Tran): R120' Self and target may hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes a 40' cube of earth each 10 minutes for conc up to 2 hr
Plane Shift (S7 Conj): Target (Charisma neg) or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Self may perform minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (S1 [Runechild] Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead; those creatures suffer Disadv on attacks on target
Protection From Poison (S2 [Runechild] Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
See Invisibility (S2 Divi): Self sees invisible and ethereal items for 1 hr
Seeming (S5 Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Charisma neg; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shocking Grasp (S0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Sleep (S1 Ench): R90' 20' radius sleeps 5d8 HP of creatures, weakest first, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 HP of creatures]
Sleet Storm (S3 Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (Dexterity neg)
Stoneskin (S4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc up to 1 hr
Suggestion (S2 Ench): R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 8 hr
Telekinesis (S5 [Runechild] Tran): R60' Self may mentally move a 1000 lb object 30'/rd (Strength neg) for conc up to 10 min
True Strike (S0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Wall Of Fire (S4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20'x1' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) w/in 10' of chosen side for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 W0 spells/May cast chosen W1 spell 1/long rest
Arcane Exemplar: May discharge 1 rune to gain 60' fly speed, inflict Disadv vs. self spells, gain resistance to spell damage, and regain spell level HP from casting for 1 rd 1/long rest; stunned afterward for 1 rd
Careful Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 1 creatures from self spell
Distant Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or to touch at 30'
Essence Runes: Spending Sorcery Points charges an equal number of runes (maximum 20); 5 charged runes emit a bright light in a 5' radius
Font Of Magic: May use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest/May convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Glyph Of Aegis: May use Reaction to discharge runes, negating 1d8 damage each; touch may transfer the protection of up to 3 runes for 1 hr
Manifest Inscriptions: R60' May discharge 1 rune to reveal hidden glyphs and gain Adv on Arcana to understand
Quickened Spell: May spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast a spell as bonus action
Runic Torrent: May discharge 2 runes to change spell damage to force and to push 15' or knock prone (Strength neg) 1/short rest
Sigilic Augmentation: May use Reaction to discharge 1 rune, gaining Adv on a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check or save 1/long rest
Sorcerous Restoration: Taking a short rest restores 4 Sorcery Points
Subtle Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell w/out somatic or verbal components
